lg.l: Occasionally as we discourst Of State; & Church, & Nation;
Occasionally we took to viewThat Engin, call'd Occasion.
Occasion fram'd for nothing else But to Occasion mischief;
A Cloak to Cover Hipocrites,O whom ye Devil is chief.
Occasion for a Loop-hole serves, When·Ever ther's Occasion
To leave Plain Dealing in ye Lurch,And fly to dear Evasion.
The Iesuit may hang him·self, And his Equivocation;
That fusty Ware's now thrown aside,Occasion's all ye Fashion.
Some Sophisters of late devis'd This new Trick, call'd Occasion,
By Wcḥ they have refin'd uponAll former Reformation.
Dull Martyrs spilt thier Blood in vain For want of this Device sir,
By this they might have Heathens beenAnd Christians in a trice Sir.
Occasion more Faces hath Upon Occasion surely,
Than any Canting Quaker makesWhen he holds forth demurely.
True Sc──t upon Occasion Can look like English Bishop,
And so he cheats wtḥ Noise & ToneAll such as come to His-shop.
Occasion can make a Man With little or no Trouble,
Sincere as any Hipocrite,And honest as Tom Double.
Occasion permits some Men Occasionally to lye Sir,
And practice things yt are too vileFor such as you & I Sir.
Occasionally they shall conform, Occsionally dissent Sir,
Occasionally shall take an OathTo break it wtḥ intent Sir.
Occasionally shall go to Church, Occasionally to Meeting;
Occasionally betray their LordWhile they like Iudas greet Him.
Occasionally deny him too, In open view of Men Sir;
And where's ye harm? for when 'tis fitThey own him can again Sir.
Occasionally comunicate, Occasionally refrain Sir;
But Constantly ComunicateWhen 'twill Occasion gain Sir.
When 'twill occasion Godly Men To Parl──────t to ride a,
And there wtḥ great SincerityTo take Occasions Side a.
On such Occasions they can kneel Like rankest Idol-aters,
But Turn once serv'd, & Place Obtain'd,No stiffer Idol-haters.
Thus 'Casionally for God they are, And 'Casionally for Devil;
Occasionally for Good again,Occasionally for Evil.
Occasionally for Heaven bound, Occasionally for Hell Sir;
But surely 'twill be sad to haveOccasion there to dwell Sir.X96A904A
